name: EmoBlazt Storm
description:
Play EmoBlazt Storm and you will find a paintball adventure that will elevate your adrenaline and the motivation to continue playing until you reach the level target. Let's help the team of emoballs to win the trophy in each level by destroying all obstacles along the way.

Easy to control, fun-filled adventure, great graphics and of cool music!

Just swap, match and tap with your fingers!
EmoBlazt Storm features:
• Experience a new way of playing match 3 and same color game.
• Combine 2 or more adjacent emoballs grouping them with the same color to make them disappear and blast.
• Swipe and match emoballs to create 3 in a row, match 4 to create special emoballs, match 5 or more to create a rainbow emoballs.
• Complete the goals before you run out of moves or time to progress through fun levels.
• Fun ways to play: Target Score, Timed Levels, Obstacle Levels, Select and Paint Levels, and more…
• Play the levels and earn extra moves or time to help you win those challenging levels.
• Collect stars by completing levels to win extra moves and time.
• Collect three stars and win a Trophy.
• Play with unique game goals and lot of entertaining obstacles!
• Statistics board to watch your progress.
• Lot of levels to complete – more to come!
• No additional purchases necessary.
• No Wi-Fi needed to play.

How to play:
• You have a specific list of goals in each level.
• Swap and match 3 or more of the same color, then tap on one of the pieces.
• Just tap two or more pieces of the same color.
• Match 4 in a row or column to create special pieces.
• Match 5 to create a special rainbow piece.
• Combine 2 rainbow pieces to create a huge chain reaction.
• Be careful with the bombs!
• Clear pieces and destroy obstacles next to it.
• The more emoballs you destroy in a single tap – the more points you earn.

• The more emoballs you destroy in a single tap – the more points you earn.
• Touch the blinking bottom emoball color to paint the white ones.
• Enjoy and have fun!

You will love the fun, challenging and excitement of this great game.
